title: Verstappen vs Russell: how the explosive F1 rivalry began
summary: Max Verstappen and George Russell are set to fight for the lead of the 2025 Canadian Grand Prix from the front row. This is why their rivalry is so charged

qa_pairs.question: Which two drivers are central to the rivalry discussed in the context of the 2025 Canadian Grand Prix?
In what year is the Canadian Grand Prix featuring Verstappen and Russell's rivalry taking place?
What position are Verstappen and Russell starting from in the 2025 Canadian Grand Prix?
